name: Colorize Jump: Catch the Color
description:
Colorize Jump: follow the color and catch it spinning the circle! Use all your skills in this simple but addictive arcade game! Simple mechanics and easy to master!

Special Features
Multiplayer! - show your skills
Challenge Friends - share your score online!
Achievements - unlock new levels!
Gameplay Statistics - climb the leader board and be the best

Colorize jump is completely free to play! Enjoy!

WHAT'S NEW
Hello Colors lovers! A big big update just for you:
• Multiplayer! 
• Custom Leaderboards
• Challenge Friends
• Achievements
• Gameplay Statistics
• Share Scores to Facebook and Twitter
• Encouraging Messages
• Clever Notifications
Thanks for you support and keep on giving us those amazing five stars rates!
